price: እናንተ ያመናችሁ ሆይ! አላህንና መልክተኛውን አትክዱ፡፡ አደራዎቻችሁንም እናንተ እያወቃችሁ አትክዱ፡፡
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَخُونُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَ وَتَخُونُوٓاْ أَمَٰنَٰتِكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā takhūnū al-laha wal-rasūla watakhūnū amānātikum wa-antum taʿlamūna
